大家好，我們再一次感謝大家對我們團隊的信任及支持。我們留意到有朋友今天（8月12日）在捐款時未留意到金額是以美元計，誤會了是以港幣計算。

如閣下有上述情況，請到我們在gofundme平台的眾籌專頁上（ https://www.gofundme.com/f/standwithhk-international ）按一下「refund」要求退款，我們會盡快處理各個退款要求。

為大家造成不便，敬請見諒。

We express our profound gratitude for your generous donations today towards the crowdfunding.

We notice that some of you may have mistaken the USD as HKD when making the donation today (12 Aug 2019). We understand the confusion would be easily derived and request refund is thus possible. To this regard, we would like to ask for those who made such misunderstanding to please kindly click the ‘refund’ on the crowdfunding website: https://www.gofundme.com/f/standwithhk-international

Your request will then be processed accordingly in due course.

Thank you so much for your support and understanding.

replies.msg:
按以下步驟安排退款：
1.以電腦瀏覽
按一下網頁右方 Stand With HK - International 旁的信封圖示，按指示填寫相關資料要求退款。

2.以流動電話瀏覽
把網頁頁面拉到中間位置，並按一下 Freedom Hong Kong (Organiser) 下方的 Contact按鈕，按指示填寫相關資料要求退款。

當你成功發出訊息後，我們會盡快處理各個退款要求。同時間我們也正在處理較早前收到的電郵退款要求。所有退款要求不論是否與港元美元問題有關，一律接受，不問理由。

為大家造成不便，敬請見諒。

If you are one of the mistaken, we ask you to visit our gofundme page and follow the instructions below for a refund:
1. Desktop
Click on the envelope icon next to the campaign name (Stand with HK - International) on the right and fill in the requested information.

2. Mobile
Scroll to the centre of the page and click the Contact button below the organiser name (Freedom Hong Kong), and fill in the requested information.

Once you have successfully submitted your refund request, we will process it as soon as possible. At the same time, we are also processing refund requests sent to us earlier via email. All refunds will be universally accepted, whether it stemmed from the US$ vs HK$ confusion or not - no reasons asked.

Thank you so much for your support and understanding, we apologise for the inconvenience caused.
